message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a steal! I think you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm afraid $120 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we say $150?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! I can do $140, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $137.50, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a fair price for a great product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still looking for a better deal. How about $132?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession: $138. It's the lowest I can go, and I really think you'll love this product.
I've made a few concessions, and I'm willing to meet you at $129. This is my final offer.
